mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name != cleaned_name[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', 'MUTATED', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(name):
    cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', name.lower())
    return cleaned_name == cleaned_name[::--1]
